title: Trump’s Both Sides Endorsement, Anti-Piracy PSA Encourages Piracy? 08.03.22
itunes:title: Trump’s Both Sides Endorsement, Anti-Piracy PSA Encourages Piracy? 08.03.22
description:
In episode 1301, Miles and guest co-host Joelle Monique are joined by comedian, Jackie Fabulous, to discuss... Even The Name “Monkeypox” Has Been Stupidly Politicized, Trump is now BOTH SIDES’ing his endorsements…, That “You Wouldn’t Steal A Car” PSA May Have Increased Piracy and more!

  1. Even The Name “Monkeypox” Has Been Stupidly Politicized
  2. Metaphors matter: Why changing the name ‘monkeypox’ may help curb the discriminatory language used to discuss it
  3. New York Asks WHO To Rename "Monkeypox" Because...
  4. Monkeypox and the Gay Community

  5. Should monkeypox be renamed? + Newsom urges Congress to safeguard California privacy law

  6. Why monkeypox put a spotlight on how we do — and how we should — name diseases
  7. Trump is now BOTH SIDES’ing his endorsements…
  8. Trump looked surprised after being booed at an Arizona rally over a Congressional endorsement
  9. That “You Wouldn’t Steal A Car” PSA May Have Increased Piracy
  10. Getting inside a downloader's head
  11. Home Taping Is Killing Music: When the Music Industry Waged War on the Cassette Tape in the 1980s, and Punk Bands Fought Back
  12. THE HILARIOUS USELESSNESS OF THOSE OLD DVD ANTI-PIRACY ADS

GET: Menoplause by Jackie Fabulous

LISTEN: Have You Fed Baby Huey Today by Surprise Chef

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
